Chief Executive Officer & Chairman

Tony Buffin

Tony is commercial & strategic lead and the consultancy’s founding partner, appointed board Chair, September 2019.

Expertise

Business strategy, multi-sector transformation and growth (suggest core expertise- i.e. what you have spent most of your career doing)



Career

Working at senior levels for FTSE 100 and ASX 20 listed businesses, Tony is a former CEO of the Loyalty Management Group (LMG) and CFO of the Coles Group in Australia, where he proved a key executive when effecting one of the most successful turnarounds in global retail. Prior to that, Tony held senior leadership positions with UK retailers Boots Alliance and Halfords.

(suggest 100 words maximum- remember that people can also click through to your LinkedIn profile which will give them full chapter and verse)



Global Experience

Tony has worked in 11 territories internationally, including extended spells in Australia, China, Hong Kong, UK and USA.

List countries here that you have worked in - either permanently, or on a project basis. If more than ten countries, then suggest it says ‘Tony has worked in XYZ countries worldwide, including X/Y/Z (named countries).

Based in our Hong Kong Office
